name: Duels Kingdom
description:
The Game

"Duels Kingdom"  is a local multiplayer party game where you compete with your friends to be named "Knight of the Year" after passing 3 randomly selected levels and getting more points than your rivals.

Controls

WARNING! You need at least two controllers or one controller and a keyboard to play!

You can play this game with keyboard and controllers. Check the controls here!

Features
  • 4 Players Local Multiplayer.
  • Keyboard and Controller Support.
  • Variety and replayability thanks to randomly selected levels.
  • Different items to make every game different.
  • Quick Games to play with friends or family and have a good time!
How to play

You'll need to score more points than your rivals by eliminating them and eliminating enemies throughout the levels. At the end of the game, the player with the higher score will be selected as "Knight of the Year" and will win the game.

Development team

I'm León Zhou Villasana (LionDev), Systems Programmer and Designer. This is my Final Degree Project and I would appreciate any feedback in the comments!

I'd like to continue the development of this game little by little and improve and add a lot of things, like more levels and items, more interaction between players and the level, LAN Connection (maybe)...

If you are interested in this project or other projects that I've made, please, check my Social Networks: Twitter, LinkedIn. Also, check my Itch.io page!
